sentences.sContent: Combining knowledge of materials science with extensive numismatic experience, they strive to the fullest extent possible to return your coin to its original appearance.
sentences.sContent_eng: Combining knowledge of materials science with extensive numismatic experience, they strive to the fullest extent possible to return your coin to its original appearance.
sentences.sCn: 结合材料科学的知识和大量钱币知识，他们尽最大努力以还原你的硬币到原本的外观。

trans.tranCn: 钱币的, 奖章的, 钱币学的
